name: Would You Still Love Me If I Was a Banana Peel?
name_original: Would You Still Love Me If I Was a Banana Peel?
description:
banana peel

/bəˈnɑːnə/ /piːl/
The ultimate artifact of love.

- About the game
This game is a simple Metroidvania in which you must explore an Alien world and use Chips to add skills to your character.

It's highly recommended to play this game with sound.

This game was made during and for the Metroidvania Jam 17.
